scripts.dev: concurrently -k 'npm run -s watch:css' 'npm run -s watch:templates' 'browser-sync start --port 3333 --server build --files build'
scripts.build:compress: for f in build/*.html; do inline-assets --htmlmin --cssmin --pattern 'css$' --verbose $f $f; done
scripts.build: npm run -s build:clean && npm run -s build:static && npm run -s build:css && bin/compile
scripts.predeploy: npm run -s build && npm run -s build:compress && rm -f build/*.css
